meanings: (잠깐) for now, for the moment, for the time being, for the present

examples.korean: Once destroyed, brain cells do not regenerate. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 뇌세포는 일단 파괴되면 재생이 안 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Once opened, this product should be kept refrigerated. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 상품은 일단 개봉한 후에는 냉장고에 보관해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Once opened, this product should be kept refrigerated. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her nervousness quickly disappeared once she was on stage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 일단 무대 위에 올라가자 그녀는 초조감이 곧 없어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Once in the bloodstream, the bacteria adhere to the surface of the red cells. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 박테리아는 일단 혈액 속에 들어가면 적혈구 표면에 들러붙는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Once in the bloodstream, the bacteria adhere to the surface of the red cells. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The water is fine once you’re in! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 일단 물 속에 들어오면 괜찮아! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
